content: Thank you for the challenge (and opportunity)! For 2017, I am creating a blog aimed at a new generation of men in midlife. The goal is to bring fun, insight, and a bit of levity to the struggle many of us face as we enter this daunting life stage. For the challenge, I will dedicate one post per week to a topic entitled “My All Time Favorite (this week).” The intent is to engage in the mindful practice of documenting and sharing one special experience per week and encourage others to do same!
